com.n9mtq4.logwindow.managers

Class StdOutRedirection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.PrintStream
          • com.n9mtq4.logwindow.managers.StdOutRedirection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdditionListener, DisableListener, EnableListener, ListenerAttribute, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class StdOutRedirection
extends java.io.PrintStream
implements AdditionListener, EnableListener, DisableListener
    Created by Will on 10/29/14.
    A class that redirected System.out.prints and prints them to a BaseConsole
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • SHOW_LOCATION_DEFAULT_VALUE

        public static final boolean SHOW_LOCATION_DEFAULT_VALUE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addToBaseConsole

        public static void addToBaseConsole(BaseConsole baseConsole)
        Adds a new instance of StdOutRedirect to the given base console. Enables the show location if SHOW_LOCATION_DEFAULT_VALUE is true. If you want to override the default value use addToBaseConsole(BaseConsole, boolean)
        Parameters:
        baseConsole - The BaseConsole to add the redirection to
        See Also:
        addToBaseConsole(BaseConsole, boolean)

      • addToBaseConsole

        public static void addToBaseConsole(BaseConsole baseConsole,
                                    boolean showLocation)
        Adds a new instance of StdOutRedirect to the given base console. Enables the show location if the showLocation param is true. If you want to use the default value use addToBaseConsole(BaseConsole)
        Parameters:
        baseConsole - The BaseConsole to add the redirection to
        showLocation - Should the redirection show the line of code the call came from?
        See Also:
        addToBaseConsole(BaseConsole)

      • onEnable

        public final void onEnable(EnableEvent enableEvent)
        This method is called when the Listener is enabled. When loading from a plugin all the plugins will be loaded before this is called.
        Specified by:
        onEnable in interface EnableListener
        Parameters:
        enableEvent - The enable action event
        See Also:

      • onDisable

        public final void onDisable(DisableEvent disableEvent)
